title: Re-Release: The Shaun King Episode Pt. 1 w/ Ashley Ray-Harris
description:
What’s poppin’, con-gregation? It’s the re-release you all have been asking for, the Shaun King episode part one with Ashley Ray-Harris. You know what episode this is. Buckle up, because we’re talk about a true scamming King. We recently reunited for a part two cause, he’s still at it. Check it out. Stay schemin’! 

 

Sources:

https://medium.com/@deray/on-shaun-king-351bd812318c

https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/darrensands/shaun-kings-days-as-a-pastor-mirrored-his-later-successes-an

https://www.vox.com/2015/8/19/9180389/the-shaun-king-controversy-explained

https://www.thedailybeast.com/shaun-king-keeps-raising-money-and-questions-about-where-it-goes-3

https://newsone.com/playlist/growing-list-of-shaun-kings-nicknames-that-have-gone-viral/

https://bleacherreport.com/articles/2733874-everything-you-need-to-know-about-kevin-durants-twitter-fail

https://www.cheatsheet.com/entertainment/the-bachelor-madison-prewett-instagram-bought-followers.html/
